turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I need to order a coffee drink from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which Starbucks do you want to get your drink from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one at 5540 Richmond Ave.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. What drink do you want me to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A Caffe Mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Tall.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Any particular kind of milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, soy if they have it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: If not?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Almond milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else you want added to it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, and actually I would like it without any whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. Do you want me to put in the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, to confirm, you want a tall Caffe Mocha with soy milk and no whipped cream from the Starbucks at 5540 Richmond Ave?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Almond milk if they're out of soy milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. Your drink is on order at 5540 Richmond Ave and can be picked up shortly.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your receipt will be sent to you via text message.
